entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
